Interface LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter

All Superinterfaces:
LogFormatter
All Known Implementing Classes:
LogFormatter.NoopFormatter
Enclosing interface:

public static non-sealed interface LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter extends LogFormatter
Formats key values.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter

    Method
    Description
    default void
    format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event)
    Formats a log event.
    void
    formatKeyValues(StringBuilder output, KeyValues keyValues)
    Format key values.
    static LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter
    of()
    Creates a formatter that will print the key values by percent encoding (RFC 3986 URI aka the format usually used in URI.getQuery()).
    static LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter
    of(List<String> keys)
    Creates a formatter that will print the key values in order of the passed in keys if they exist in percent encoding (RFC 3986 URI aka the format usually used in URI.getQuery()).
    default LogFormatter.FormatterType
    type()
    The type of formatter.

    • of

      static LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter of(List<String> keys)
      Creates a formatter that will print the key values in order of the passed in keys if they exist in percent encoding (RFC 3986 URI aka the format usually used in URI.getQuery()).
      Parameters:
      keys - keys where order is important.
      Returns:
      formatter.
